attributes.action: Restrict the use of the "Regulation of Investigatory Powers (RIP) Act" by the excessive amount public bodies which exploit it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The "Regulation of Investigatory Powers Act 2000" infringes upon the civil liberties of the people of Great Britain. The 795 public bodies which now have access to our personal information is ridiculously excessive. We the undersigned wish the prime minister to restrict the use of this act therefore stoping the abuse of the act by such bodies as local councils to spy upon there own constituents over trivial matters.
